name: Hexachrome
description:
Here is our game: Hexachrome!

It is a simple exploration game, so we've tried to make it as beautiful as possible.

Made for ludum dare 37. Here is the link to the entry page.
Enjoy !

Edit 16-12-13 v1.01 (post ld): added a little update to make the ball faster and a single version for wasd and zqsd controls.

Instructions:
- arrow keys or wasd to move (a zqsd version is available)
- space, left click or right click to fly

A game by:
Marie Saby: Art Director
Maxime Labate: Game/3d Designer
Kevin Nguyen: Game Designer, Unity Programmer, Sound Designer

With the enjoyable company of our jam friends: Mathieu Rubio, Vincent Landrieux, Léa Cluzel, Damien Picard, Anne-Laure Georges-Molland, Flavio Perez.
